game.name: THROUGH TIME·SUMMER OF GIRL PUZZLE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: On a summer beach, restore photo after photo as jigsaw puzzles to unlock new encounters and conversations with different girls. A light puzzle + romance game featuring multiple heroines, full voice-over.
game.shortDescriptionEn: On a summer beach, restore photo after photo as jigsaw puzzles to unlock new encounters and conversations with different girls. A light puzzle + romance game featuring multiple heroines, full voice-over.
